question: [File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Consensus.AEDPoS/AEDPoSContract_ACS11_CrossChainInformationProvider.cs] [Function: DistributeResourceTokensToPreviousMiners()] [Duplicate Symbols] Does the Union operation at line 74 prevent duplicate symbols, or can same token be distributed twice if it appears in both PayTxFeeSymbolListName and PayRentalSymbolListName? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Consensus.AEDPoS/AEDPoSContract_ACS11_CrossChainInformationProvider.cs] [Function: DistributeResourceTokensToPreviousMiners()] [Invalid Symbols] At line 76, if GetBalance is called with non-existent or invalid symbol, does it return zero gracefully or throw, potentially aborting distribution? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Consensus.AEDPoS/AEDPoSContract_ACS11_CrossChainInformationProvider.cs] [Function: DistributeResourceTokensToPreviousMiners()] [Time-of-Check-Time-of-Use] Balance is queried at line 76 but used at line 88, can balance change in between (e.g., via concurrent transfer), causing transfer to fail or distribute incorrect amounts? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Consensus.AEDPoS/AEDPoSContract_ACS11_CrossChainInformationProvider.cs] [Function: DistributeResourceTokensToPreviousMiners()] [Reentrancy] Can GetBalance call at line 76 trigger callbacks that modify consensus state or token balances before distribution completes? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Consensus.AEDPoS/AEDPoSContract_ACS11_CrossChainInformationProvider.cs] [Function: DistributeResourceTokensToPreviousMiners()] [Calculation Error] At line 81, amount is calculated once, but used in loop at line 88, can balance depletion during loop cause later transfers to fail, distributing tokens unfairly to early miners only? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Consensus.AEDPoS/AEDPoSContract_ACS11_CrossChainInformationProvider.cs] [Function: DistributeResourceTokensToPreviousMiners()] [Underflow] If multiple symbols are distributed and total transfers exceed actual balance due to rounding or concurrent transfers, can this cause balance underflow or failed transactions? (Medium)

(High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Consensus.AEDPoS/AEDPoSContract_ACS11_CrossChainInformationProvider.cs] [Function: DistributeResourceTokensToPreviousMiners()] [Address Collision] If two miners have public keys that hash to same address (collision attack), can one miner receive double distribution while other gets nothing? [File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Consensus.AEDPoS/AEDPoSContract_ACS11_CrossChainInformationProvider.cs] [Function: DistributeResourceTokensToPreviousMiners()] [Malicious Key] Can a miner provide public key that derives to zero address, contract address, or other protected address to steal funds or cause transfer failures? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Consensus.AEDPoS/AEDPoSContract_ACS11_CrossChainInformationProvider.cs] [Function: DistributeResourceTokensToPreviousMiners()] [Reentrancy] Can Transfer.Send at line 88 trigger callbacks to malicious miner contracts that re-enter DistributeResourceTokensToPreviousMiners or UpdateInformationFromCrossChain? [File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Consensus.AEDPoS/AEDPoSContract_ACS11_CrossChainInformationProvider.cs] [Function: DistributeResourceTokensToPreviousMiners()] [Gas Griefing] Can a malicious miner contract consume excessive gas during transfer callback, causing distribution to miners later in list to fail due to out-of-gas? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Consensus.AEDPoS/AEDPoSContract_ACS11_CrossChainInformationProvider.cs] [Function: DistributeResourceTokensToPreviousMiners()] [Front-Running] Can miners observe pending UpdateInformationFromCrossChain transaction and front-run with transfers to drain consensus contract balance before distribution? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Consensus.AEDPoS/AEDPoSContract_ACS11_CrossChainInformationProvider.cs] [Function: DistributeResourceTokensToPreviousMiners()] [Selective DoS] Can a single malicious miner in the list cause all distributions to fail by making their address reject transfers, preventing all miners from receiving rewards? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Consensus.AEDPoS/AEDPoSContract_ACS11_CrossChainInformationProvider.cs] [Function: DistributeResourceTokensToPreviousMiners()] [Unfair Distribution] If transfer to early miners succeeds but later ones fail due to balance depletion, can this systematically favor certain miners based on public key ordering? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Consensus.AEDPoS/AEDPoSContract_ACS11_CrossChainInformationProvider.cs] [Overall] [Atomicity] Are state updates in UpdateInformationFromCrossChain (lines 55, 58-61) and token distributions (line 53) atomic, or can partial failures leave consensus in inconsistent state?
